plain: Based on the user's favourite movies, it can be inferred that their favourite genre is comedy, their favourite plot is dark and satirical, their favourite musical score is rock and roll, their favourite mood for the musical score is dark and brooding, their favourite setting is modern urban, their favourite visual style is low budget and gritty, their favourite writing style is satirical and irreverent, their favourite runtime is short, and their favourite themes are social commentary and satire.
